games.title: Skyrim
games.review: The epic fifth chapter in the Elder Scrolls franchise. The player escapes unjust execution to fufill their destiny. With a massive open world and righteous DLC, this game is a must play for any fan of the RPG genre.

games.title: Red Dead Redepmtion 2
games.review: Rockstar's second installment follows the Van der Linde gang through changing times in the West. Pinkertons, funded by wealthy business magnates, are trying to take the west from the outlaws. A truly beautiful game with enough side quests, easter eggs, and exploration for hours and hours of gameplay.

games.title: Fallout 3
games.review: The epic fifth chapter in the Elder Scrolls franchise. The player escapes unjust execution to fufill their destiny. With a massive open world and righteous DLC, this game is a must play for any fan of the RPG genre.
